With media publishing and telecasting irresponsibly, censorship is the need of the hour. Do you agree or disagree? Please elaborate with reasons and examples.

Yes, I agree that there is a need of censorship along with media publishing and telecasting, mainly in film industry because now-a-days there are many scenes which all ages of audience should not be seen. To avoid those scenes censorship is necessary for such scenes which has more exposing of body of actors. It will be useful in such cases along with, media publishing and telecasting.

                                   Media publishing and telecasting is mainly useful to promote their product and increase customers by giving advertisements trough media. Media has an advantage to cover large volume of target customers. In some cases customers can get wrong message or wrong statement when displayed through media and device or any medium, to overcome for such mistakes censorship is used.

Example, in TV News images of criminals can be censored because they may not be the original criminals, especially in the case of ladies, media cannot show ladies faces, keeping prestige of ladies in mind. If media shows all such things audience may get wrong opinion on media or a particular company.

                                  In case of business world media cannot deliver all the things or news about company or product in such cases even after delivering a message company can censor a thing which they need. Telecasting will be done according to the norms and permission of the company, even though it may go wrong sometimes in some cases, in such situations censorship will be needed. Many business people and companies are getting negative reputation due to such mistakes. Once the message or news are displayed through media, if mistake is displayed company has only one choice, that is to use of censorship. To rescue their reputation and profits they use censorship.

                                  In case of some other industry other than business, example, film industry, the impact of not using censorship will be on students and youth. Their lives will be spoiled due to telecasting such exposing scenes. Indirectly students can't perform well in their studies and cannot get jobs. So, it is so necessary to have censorship to save students' life in another way. Media should think of such scenes which makes impact on students and such scenes should ne censored. censorship is the need of the hour in some cases such as which were mentioned earlier.

                                  Almost all the companies has competitors, competitors may create some problems to the companies by using media, in such cases also companies can save their fame by censoring the news immediately when they want. In some cases, the strategies of business were be leaked. Through censorship companies strategies can be kept secret. Hence financially they can be saved from getting loss and also they can be saved from not getting bad reputation.

                                  Now-a-days, Media that companies mostly using is Social Media, mainly through websites like Facebook, Twitters, Linked-in etc. Here companies and People promote themselves in a very creative way. Companies try to promote themselves and makes connections with other companies. They can increase their network and customer base to get maximum sales online and tries to get more profit. They publish themselves online. Sometimes companies may get a problem of bad response from audience or target customers through comments and dislikes, in such cases they can hide those responses through censorship.

Conclusion: Censorship is needed of the hour along with media publishing and telecasting to save company's reputation, profits also students' future.
